text:
Page 2
If no such publications exist, would it be possible, in your
opinion, to ask somebody to collect the required data from two
or three of the most active universities for radio-correspondence
courses and the same number for television-correspondence courses
before the end of May? If so, whom would you suggest, and for
what fee can this be done?
Thanking you in advance for your co-operation.
Yours sincerely.
Programme Specialist
Department of Mass Communication
